question: Norman Gimbel, the Oscar & Grammy-winning lyricist has passed away. He was from which country?
explanation: Norman Gimbel (91), the Oscar & Grammy-winning American  lyricist has passed away in New York on December 17, 2018. His lyrics graced hit songs such as Roberta Flack\'s \"Killing me softly with his song\" and Jim Croce\'s \"I got a name\". He also wrote the English lyrics to the Brazilian bossa nova melody \'The Girl From Ipanema\'.
